name: Idunnuoluwa Abimbola
intro: who thinks about design, architecture, and functionality when writing code. I study and use frameworks. I can recognize patterns and program with style and efficiency using computer science approaches. I am driven to continuously improve my skills and advance professionally.
about: I've always been fascinated with computers and technology. My first encounter with code was in 2015, when I used HTML to create static websites and Scratch to create games. In 2020, I began coding in Python and Dart/Flutter, and I plan to increase my talents to encompass backend development in the near future. I spend my free time coding, watching YouTube videos, and scrolling around tiktok. I'd want to collaborate with you on making your app a reality.ðŸ¤“

gigs.name: Wehaul driver app
gigs.about: A logistics management app for drivers on the Wehaul Logistics Network

gigs.name: Wehaul app
gigs.about: With Wehaul 247 app, you get to move your goods around for the best prices in the fastest possible time. Getting a vehicle & driver to move your item is really easy, whether dispatch bikes, cars, SUVs, vans, trucks, and much more, there is an available option near you to pick up right now, later in the day or another day.

gigs.name: Cloudmall africa
gigs.about: Cloudmall helps you shop for your everyday needs - Food, Groceries ,Pet Supplies, Pharmacy, Books, Stationeries and more and get it delivered Now.

projects.name: Shar anonymous messages
projects.about: Shar is an app like kubool that allows you to send anonymous messages to anyone on the app via a link. It was built with a Django backend, and the frontend was built with Flutter.

projects.name: Unscramble
projects.about: Web app built in Flutter to find definitions of words and partial anagrams. I built both the frontend and backend from scratch. https://unscramble.deta.dev/ for the API base URL.

projects.name: Memes app
projects.about: Flutter android app to display memes scraped from Reddit with the memes-api API.

projects.name: Jar of hearts
projects.about: A template I use to build birthday greeting-card type apps.
